name: Showstopper
description: Deal 50 damage. You lose all queue slots next turn. Lose all your buffs. Deal 5 additional damage for each queue slot lost and 2 additional damage for each buff lost.

immediateEffect.script: int baseDamage = 50; int queueSlots = Battle.QueueSize; var buffs = GetBuffs(Player); int buffCount = buffs.Count; foreach (var buff in buffs) { RemoveStatus(buff); } int bonusDamage = (queueSlots * 5) + (buffCount * 2); int totalDamage = baseDamage + bonusDamage; DealDamage(Opponent, totalDamage); Battle.QueueSize = 0;
